welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Heppenheim, a charming city known for its picturesque vineyards and historic buildings. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and set to open in 2023, Terminal 3 will be the future home of Lufthansa and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours per day.
